name: Watermelon Web Works
description: Watermelon Web Works was founded in 2002 to build amazing websites for small businesses & non-profits. Our main offices are located in Portland, Oregon and Denver, Colorado, but we serve clients from all across the nation. We’re always happy to sit down and meet face-to-face with local clients. The key to great web design is communication – we strive to listen to our clients needs so that we can provide the best results possible that meet (or exceed) their expectations.
